alert.note: Alert for DeKalb (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 06 at 1:21PM CDT until August 06 at 2:00PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: The National Weather Service in Huntsville Alabama has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southeastern DeKalb County in northeastern Alabama... * Until 200 PM CDT. * At 120 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Fort Payne, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Fort Payne, Rainsville, Sylvania, Valley Head, Hammondville, Mentone, Pine Ridge, Dog Town, Adamsburg and Desoto State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
